abstract: Evaluation research has become an important branch of educational research, the variety of contributions to the 31 FIGHT-session evaluation research in music education makes it clear that the music education research provide a significant contribution in this, the situation is. Evaluation research has become an important branch of educational research, the variety of contributions to the 31 FIGHT-session evaluation research in music education makes it clear that the music education research provide a significant contribution in this, the situation is. As targeted contributions of this band on the conditions, to check contents, methods and results of music curricular reform initiatives and innovations with regard to the related objectives and evaluate in order to improve the music-related activity and corresponding teaching-learning processes to arrive
